title: Low, Mid & High Grade HOFers - Matty, WaJo, Cobb
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Low, Mid & High Grade HOFers - Matty, WaJo, Cobb
posts.post_content:
Added a few new ones.  Both Mattys are really nice for the grade (centering obviously an issue on the SGC 50).  McGinnity probably has the brightest red of any card I've owned.

Prices includes shipping and insurance.  Prices are firm.  Paypal f/f.

Joss $606 SOLD
McGinnity $606
Mathewson portrait SGC 50 $1075
Johnson $1300
Mathewson portrait SGC A (not trimmed in the typical sense, hand-cut with huge borders - crease-free) $606
Cobb PSA 2 (has a few minor issues, but no creases and very nice eye appeal) $1450
Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 4.5 $1250
Great shine on these, Luke. Beauties.
Thanks guys :)   Bump for some new cards.
